name: Galen's Enchanted Emporium
description:
"Welcome demon, welcome to the mortal lands of Carystus. Your arrival is none too late. Galen's enchanted emporium is running short on working hands.
Quick now, adventurers will be rushing the dungeons any moment now. Remember, you cannot collect uncorrupted souls. Make sure you enchant our potions so the corruption within them grows.
Yes, I am aware you have no fighting skills. Or weapons. Do not fret, the dungeons are full of hazards you can use to dispose of the adventurers. I'm sure you won't disappoint Galen."

Galen's Enchanted Emporium is our entry for 2020's 7DRL. 

This is our first game, first time using Godot, and a bunch more firsts.

Your job is to corrupt the souls of dungeon-faring adventurers and collect their soul shards within the dungeons. Use your potion-making skills so you stack the odds in your favor.

Controls:  Mouse in the potions crafting shop (drag and drop) 

WASD to move in dungeons and SPACE to dodge. 

Let us know your feedback in the comments. 

See our progress and follow us here: https://twitter.com/TailCraftStudio 
This was an amazing learning experience and we'll be writing our postmortem soon.
